comments.content: When u get to stage 2 of the quest, it says: when revealed search the encounter deck and discard pile for a black rider. . . Do you grab one black rider from the encounter deck and discard pile or is it just one black rider?? Thanks

its just 1 black rider in total. ffg word it that way incase the encounter deck doesnt have any left.

rich
thanks rich. That explains why the scenario has been destroying me lol
haha - no problem though this one destroys me with just 1 anyways!
